description: This is a Python source file implementing authentication services including user registration and login, interfacing with a database via SQLAlchemy and utilizing security utilities to generate JWT tokens.

methods.name: str register_user(db: Session, email: str, password: str, full_name: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Registers a new user in the database and returns a JWT access token.

methods.name: Optional[str] login_user(db: Session, email: str, password: str)
methods.description: Authenticates an existing user and returns a JWT access token upon success.

ctags.name: login_user
ctags.pattern: /^def login_user(db: Session, email: str, password: str) -> Optional[str]:$/

ctags.name: register_user
ctags.pattern: /^def register_user(db: Session, email: str, password: str, full_name: Optional[str] = None) -> st/
ctags.signature: (db: Session, email: str, password: str, full_name: Optional[str] = None)
